BROOKS
v.
CAPSTAR CORPORATION. No. 110A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2005. John Morris, Michelle Sain Langdon, Roberta S. Sperry, Charlotte, for Capstar Corporation, et al. David Parker, Statesville, for Patricia Brooks. Bob Bollinger, Charlotte, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 5005 by NC Academy of Trial Lawyers for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of April 2005."
